languages.text: "Оно сильно, безусловно, но дух мой сильней Доппельгренделя. Раз я одолел его в схватке, неужели не одолею его чары? Нет, однажды я обязательно обрету славную гибель на поле сражения!"

"The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"
languages.original_text: "Оно сильно, безусловно, но дух мой сильней Доппельгренделя. Раз я одолел его в схватке, неужели не одолею его чары? Нет, однажды я обязательно обрету славную гибель на поле сражения!"

traits.locale_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «La maldición es fuerte, de eso no cabe duda, pero mi espíritu es más fuerte que un Doppelgrendel. Vencí a uno en combate, ¿acaso no voy a poder superar su magia? ¡Algún día alcanzaré una muerte gloriosa en combate!».
languages.original_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"

traits.locale_text: «La maldición es fuerte, de eso no cabe duda, pero mi espíritu es más fuerte que un Doppelgrendel. Vencí a uno en combate, ¿acaso no voy a poder superar su magia? ¡Algún día alcanzaré una muerte gloriosa en combate!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “诅咒很强大，这一点毋庸置疑，但我的灵魂比化身者更强大。我已经在战斗中战胜了化身者，难道我还战胜不了它的诅咒吗？不，总有一天，我会在战场上光荣战死！”
languages.original_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"

traits.locale_text: “诅咒很强大，这一点毋庸置疑，但我的灵魂比化身者更强大。我已经在战斗中战胜了化身者，难道我还战胜不了它的诅咒吗？不，总有一天，我会在战场上光荣战死！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「呪いの力は間違いなく強い。だが俺の精神はドッペルグレンデルよりも強い。あいつを戦いで倒したんだ。やつの魔法に勝てないなんてことがあるか？そんなはずはない。いつか戦場で栄光の死を遂げるよ！」
languages.original_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「呪いの力は間違いなく強い。だが俺の精神はドッペルグレンデルよりも強い。あいつを戦いで倒したんだ。やつの魔法に勝てないなんてことがあるか？そんなはずはない。いつか戦場で栄光の死を遂げるよ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « La malédiction est puissante, aucun doute là-dessus, mais mon esprit est plus fort qu'un doppelgrendel. Puisque j'en ai vaincu un en combat, je peux tout aussi bien résister à sa magie. Non, c'est au champ d'honneur, les armes à la main, que je tomberai ! »
languages.original_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"

traits.locale_text: « La malédiction est puissante, aucun doute là-dessus, mais mon esprit est plus fort qu'un doppelgrendel. Puisque j'en ai vaincu un en combat, je peux tout aussi bien résister à sa magie. Non, c'est au champ d'honneur, les armes à la main, que je tomberai ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Der Fluch ist stark, daran besteht kein Zweifel, doch mein Geist ist stärker als eine Doppelgrendel. Ich habe eine im Kampf besiegt, warum sollte ich also nicht ihre Magie überwinden können? Nein, eines Tages werde ich auf dem Schlachtfeld einen glorreichen Tod finden!"
languages.original_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Fluch ist stark, daran besteht kein Zweifel, doch mein Geist ist stärker als eine Doppelgrendel. Ich habe eine im Kampf besiegt, warum sollte ich also nicht ihre Magie überwinden können? Nein, eines Tages werde ich auf dem Schlachtfeld einen glorreichen Tod finden!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"

languages.text: "Lanetin güçlü olduğuna şüphe yok ama benim ruhum da Suretçalanlardan güçlüdür. Çatışmada bir tanesini yenmiştim, onun büyüsünden mi kurtulamayacağım? Hayır, ölümün şanlı olanıyla savaş meydanında kucaklaşacağım!"
languages.original_text: "The curse is strong, there is no doubt about that, but my spirit is stronger than a Doppelgrendel. I overcame one in combat, so can I not overcome its magic? No, one day I will find a glorious death on the field of battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Lanetin güçlü olduğuna şüphe yok ama benim ruhum Suretçalan'dan güçlüdür. Bir çatışma sırasında bir tanesini yenmiştim, onun büyüsünden mi kurtulamayacağım? Hayır, ölümle savaş alanında kucaklaşacağım!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
